title: Status
description: Mastodon API Status schema based on GoToSocial implementation

created_at.description: The date when this status was created (ISO 8601 Datetime)

in_reply_to_id.description: ID of the status being replied to

in_reply_to_account_id.description: ID of the account being replied to

spoiler_text.description: Subject, summary, or content warning for the status

language.description: Primary language of this status (ISO 639 Part 1 two-letter language code)

url.description: The status's publicly available web URL

replies_count.description: Number of replies to this status

reblogs_count.description: Number of times this status has been boosted/reblogged

favourites_count.description: Number of favourites/likes this status has received

favourited.description: This status has been favourited by the account viewing it

reblogged.description: This status has been boosted/reblogged by the account viewing it

muted.description: Replies to this status have been muted by the account viewing it

bookmarked.description: This status has been bookmarked by the account viewing it

pinned.description: This status has been pinned by the account viewing it

content.description: The content of this status (HTML or plaintext)

reblog.description: The boosted status (if this is a boost)

application.description: The application used to post this status

account.description: The account that posted this status

media_attachments.description: Media that is attached to this status

mentions.description: Mentions of users within the status content

tags.description: Hashtags used within the status content

emojis.description: Custom emoji to be used when rendering status content

card.description: Preview card for links in the status

edited_at.description: Timestamp of when the status was last edited (ISO 8601 Datetime)
